channel.title: Unable to run on mac
channel.description:
Hey guys, i have been searching and searching, trying and trying to get a rsps going for me to own. But i can understand everything until i begin to press "run.bat" essentially to start the client or what not. But when i do this a pop up appears saying: "There is no application set to open the document “runMoparScape.bat”."
It does this with most non file things. It's annoying because I am not sure what application it comes under since it has no application as it is a direct download from the internet.
It would be much appreciated if someone can come up with the solution.
Here are some things I have tried already:
1. Searched on app store. :D
2. Looked for a suitable application to run it on.
3. Tried to got to system/library/coreservice/installer.app
4. Things with terminal etc.
4. Hit my computer a thousand times. ;)
Anyway the main thing is i am mainly trying to get a 317 server going hopefully to own and to develop into a great server. The only thing holding me back is this.
Cheers for any help. :)

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:
